sn45.77:1.2: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami, yena anuppanno va ariyo atthangiko maggo uppajjati, uppanno va ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavanaparipurim gacchati, yathayidam, bhikkhave, kalyanamittata.
sn45.77:1.3: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavessati, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikarissati.
sn45.77:1.4: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti?
sn45.77:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn45.77:1.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti”ti.
